title: How to Temporarily Dye Hair With Food Dye

steps.title: Find an old bottle, or buy a hair dye bottle at your nearest beauty supply store.
steps.content: Find an old bottle, or buy a hair dye bottle at your nearest beauty supply store.

steps.title: Fill the bottle with conditioner till it is about 3/4 full.
steps.content: Fill the bottle with conditioner till it is about 3/4 full.

steps.title: Put as many drops of food coloring as you need into the bottle with the conditioner.
steps.content: Put as many drops of food coloring as you need into the bottle with the conditioner.

steps.title: Shake the contents of the bottle.
steps.content: Shake the contents of the bottle.

steps.title: Wash your hair.
steps.content: Wash your hair. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Blow dry it until it is completely dry.
steps.content: Blow dry it until it is completely dry.

steps.title: Put on disposable gloves.
steps.content: Put on disposable gloves. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Part your hair into sections.
steps.content: Part your hair into sections. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Unclip the section of hair you want to dye first.
steps.content: Unclip the section of hair you want to dye first. Put the dye solution prepared earlier on this section of hair. Repeat for each hair section. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Leave the dye in for as long as you want.
steps.content: Leave the dye in for as long as you want. The longer you leave it in, the stronger the hair color will be. If you can, put on a cap and wear it for a few hours. Many hours makes for a better color. Realize that any leakage of the dye will stain, so sleep on a few layers of old, unwanted towels if you're leaving it in overnight.

steps.title: Wash your hair to remove the solution from it.
steps.content: Wash your hair to remove the solution from it.

steps.title: Blow dry your hair.
steps.content: Blow dry your hair. Brush it.

steps.title: Enjoy your awesome colored hair.
steps.content: Enjoy your awesome colored hair. The hair color will wash out after several washings. But the color may last for about 3 to 12 weeks for some hair.
